snippet.title: Johnny Depp snagged a victory in his court battle against ex-wife Amber Heard #Shorts
snippet.description:
Title: Charity to reveal if Amber Heard donated $7M Johnny Depp divorce settlement #Shorts

Read More Stories Here: www.haveitalldaily.com 

Description: 
Amber Heard publicly made a promise to give her $7m divorce settlement from Johnny Depp to charity but nothing was ever confirmed. Well Johnny Depp isn’t one to give up and has been granted a partial petition by a judge in New York that has ordered the American Civil Liberties Union to release documents to confirm whether Heard donated the 2017 divorce payout. 

“Mr. Depp is most gratified by the Court’s decision,” Depp’s attorney Benhamin Chew told USA Today. 

His lawyers claim that Amber was lying about donating all of her divorce settlement to ACLU and the Children’s Hospital Los Angeles and may have cost him his libel case against a British newspaper in November 2020.

His attorney Andrew Caldecott claimed that Amber’s claim of donating money to charity was “calculated and manipulative lie” that “tipped the scales against Mr. Depp from the very beginning.” 

Lawyers for News Group Newspapers claim, Amber had intended to pay it out over 10 years and had not lied.
tags: Entertainment News Have It All Daily
Hollywood latest news Have It All Daily
